translations: [电子] 场致发光电，致发光

sentences.sentence: A faint electroluminescence phenomenon has also been observed.
sentences.translation: 试验中已观察到微弱的电致发光。

sentences.sentence: Organic electroluminescence is recently a research hotspot in the world.
sentences.translation: 有机电致发光是近年来国际上的一个研究热点。

sentences.sentence: The study on Organic electroluminescence devices (OELDs) have become one of the fascinating fields recently.
sentences.translation: 有机电致发光器件是近年来化学家研究的热门课题之一。
